name: Gather Girls
description:
We aim to create an adult game with 2d gameplay and 3d rendered animations.

It's inspired by runescape, animal crossing, eroges and open world games.

So far there's only 2 girls and 2 animations, and you can only use mining. We're planning to add more girls, inventory, shop, meaningful progression, more story and more parts of the islands.

Support us on patreon, so we can eventually spend more time on development - https://www.patreon.com/SwiftKoala
